website_summaries.verdict: D-Link needs to partner with IFTTT and fix performance inconsistencies to match the versatility and convenience of Belkin's WeMo Switch and WeMo Insight Switch.
pros: D-Link's $50 Wi-Fi Smart Plug offers remote control of your small appliances, including scheduling and energy usage stats -- a better value than the $60 Belkin WeMo Insight Switch, which has similar features
cons: The Smart Plug isn't compatible with IFTTT, setup was surprisingly involved, performance was unreliable, and the app design could use some work

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to setup.  (seriously.)  "The pin code is not correct.  Please try again."
customer_reviews.text: Won't connect. Tells me I have the wrong pin code. Verified pin code on included info card with sticker on unit. If I try to use the QR code, it still makes me do everything manually. The app wasn't designed with the idea that the pin code would not be accepted either, so I've tried manually closing the app multiple times and restarting but I always get the same message. "The pin code is not correct. Please try again." I have had no issues installing other devices into the app.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: D-LINK always is best, easy install and easy use, I connected to my desktop computer case because I used my desktop with WINDOWS DESKTOP REMOTE application, some time my windows operation got freeze and i’m not at office to restart my computer physically then I use this device to cutoff electric and connect electric to my computer again. in CORONAVIRUS season then I can work with my office computer remotely and staying at home and control everything remotely, thanks d-link
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with MyDlink apps
customer_reviews.text: This is DLinks older hardware that they no longer support. It only works with the older MyDlink home app. These switches will not work with DLink's new apps and new features. When you scan the installation QR code the app says that this switch is not compatible. For some reason DLink doesn't update their apps when new products come out, they only create new apps that are not backwards compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon would not post my review without being specific so here goes. App does not work with device. QR scan in app does not scan ansd when you try to set up manually the pin code that is printed on device says that it is wrong. I can't tell you how much time i spent trying to make this work to no avail. I am going back to quality products and forget all about D-Link. Do not waste your money as this will definitely disappoint you!
customer_reviews.author: Slimhaven

customer_reviews.title: It works but the potential is a bit limited due to poor d-link software.
customer_reviews.text: Outlet works okay. I wish D-Link would improve their software ecosystem. I have to have two apps on my phone to connect to this d-link outlet and my d-link webcam. Outlet work 90% of the time. Sometimes it takes a couple tries to actually have it turn on or off. Energy usage data is not intuitive or terribly useful. Temperature is also not terribly useful as it always reads about 10 degrees warmer. If D-Link improved their software both of those functions would actually be useful. Scheduling system is nice. My intention is to use this to turn on/off an engine block heater. For that purpose this outlet will work very well.
customer_reviews.author: mnmike

customer_reviews.title: Would not "find the device"
customer_reviews.text: the plug would not finish installation thru the dlink app. could not "find the device". followed both wps and manual instructions and tried multiple routers. only conclusion is the setup is far more complicated than promised, or the plug is defective. either way it gets returned and i will never buy another like it. i should have listened to the other reviewers that complained about setup. i suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: dougk

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly, pretty easy to set up, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically write reviews except for when I am really impressed. If you follow the instructions it is actually quite easy to set up and I’ve been using it for a couple weeks now and it has function flawlessly. It works when I’m on my local Wi-Fi network or when I’m 100 or more miles away. That’s exactly advertised. I can’t write their tech-support because I didn’t need any. Great product! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris P. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love playing with this! Okay but really, we set it up on our air conditioner for the summer. Created a schedule so it will run automatically like a normal mechanical timer most of the time. And on days we get home early I can log into the app on the way home and BAM my A/C is already on when I get home. Yay! Best thing for me was that it was a Dlink product as I'm already using Dlink for other things in my home. Now if I can just find uses for more of these...
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Marisa Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Completely defective
customer_reviews.text: So this device is apparently defective according to D-Link customer support...the firmware 1.00 doesn't work and there is no way to update it without bricking the device. They offered to send me a replacement but I'm just going to find an alternative that works better, especially after reading this article about how insecure this device is. [...] I can't speak for newer versions of this device but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working, period!
customer_reviews.text: It is not bad, it is sooooo bad in so many aspects. I am an IT engineer myself. It is safe to say, if I can't make it work, tried in 2 different environment and couple of different settings from the router side, then there is something essentially WRONG with the device. In short, it just doesn't not connect to the app; when, during a short period of time, it does, it's very unstable. I won't trust controlling my home or any powered electronic device with this thing. D-link needs to work on it a lot harder than they did.
customer_reviews.author: Vasoptic

customer_reviews.title: It would be a very cool device if it works...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving up on this thing! What should be a cool thing to have just became a very frustrating experience. An "easy setup process" that is not really so easy. Manual is poor than poor in terms of information, troubleshooting, and guiding thru the process of getting the device working. Check network, turn on the device, open app, try to set up, and... it doesn't work again, and again, and again, and again! It would be a very cool device if it works...
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Product works, app is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: D-Link fails greatly across their product categories with App building. This plug is functional. And a great idea. However, the app interface STILL has not been updated to be satisfactory (this review is over a year after the product was purchased - app still sucks). Take a gander at app reviews for D-link apps. They're all the same. I wonder why no one there seems to care. Products are OK and work as designed but the interface and making them do exactly what I want them to do are greatly lacking. I can't recommend D-link.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Some connectivity/compatibility issues
customer_reviews.text: We had an existing DLink system in the house, unfortunately it required a separate app to run the outlet. Before we had Alexa there were too many app updates. If you do not have Alexa you may have other connecting issues. Make sure you check the compatibility with DLinks other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: XacMan Consumer Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to set one up in the basement for a sump pump. The app could only find the device periodically and I could never complete the configuration. It seemed old tech.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H. Jenney

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in a basic manner.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in a basic manner. However the software is not as smart as it could be. For example it can't be set up to turn off after a delay when manually turned on (turn off an iron or curling iron.) Also the programmable on/off cycles can't be set in less than 15 minute increments. Note to the designers - please improve the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: SAF729

customer_reviews.title: The products works as expected, however, after upgrading ...
customer_reviews.text: The products works as expected, however, after upgrading the firmware!!. Upgrade would not be possible with the provided instructions or information available in dlink website. Unless you call D-Link customer service, you may not figure out the problem (even for a user with many D-Link products.) If you are facing issues after couple of tries, call the D-Link customer service without further wasting time. I should also highlight that D-Link customer care team member AR004648 was able to help quickly by identifying the old version (the product was shipped with version 1.0, probably) and helping me to upgrade the firmware to 1.13 (from the company's website in Taiwan.) After the upgrade, the products works without any issue for now.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cetin

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Dlink smart plug we have. Others work perfectly but this model/unit only intermittently connected with wifi networks. Usage meter only worked once. Scheduling never worked. Factory reset and firmware updates did not help. Returned
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: It might work for you it might not you never know
customer_reviews.text: After 3 hours on the phone with tech support at D-Link we could not get this to hook to my Wi-Fi we went through all the proper processes and steps we did everything that they said. It also would not connect to my echo pod which you know it claims its Alexa friendly but it did not seem to be so my rating on this unfortunately is only a 2-star because my experience was bad
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Now.
customer_reviews.text: It was a lit bit difficult to start with, because the original product has a little bug : it's hard to create a myDlink account. Need several tries. Even after that, the plug is not related to myDlink, but on WiFi network, you can program and use the plug as expected. You need a WPS on WiFi and an Android or Apple device. There is no other way to program the plug (like a webpage). Today, June 20th, there is a firmware upgrade and an Android App upgrade. Now all is working fine. Good price, reliability, no big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aloyse

customer_reviews.title: Once I extended my wifi signal out to where I ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I extended my wifi signal out to where I am using this switch it works very well. The latest update to the app also improved the performance. My only gripe is that on/off time programming is too restrictive; I do not see why the advanced programs have to be in whopping 30 minute intervals; why not five minute or even one minute intervals? I'll revise my review once this is done with another update.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Simes

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I have had mine for about three years and it has NEVER connected properly to WiFi. I've never been able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It does work !
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of this high tech stuff, the hardware is miles ahead of the software. Bought this to turn on our dLink Camera. It does that task just fine. I was disappointed that I could not control this from my iPad (now software available) but it works just fine from my Android phone. To view the camera you will need to use another piece of software. The hardware is fine the software jocks just need to catch up!
customer_reviews.author: Rusted Nut Garage

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this product was not good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and returned both. Neither worked consistently and were so inconsistent it was unacceptable. Not sure what the problem was with the smart plugs.The other D-Link wifi smart products seem fine so it was not my setup or my wifi. I may try just the plain smart plug without the additional monitoring. I really want to have a smart plug and there aren't any other brands that will work with the D-Link app.
customer_reviews.author: ALKJ

customer_reviews.title: ordered this smart plug along with dlink's motion detector
customer_reviews.text: ordered this smart plug along with dlink's motion detector. still waiting for motion sensor to arrive but setup of the smart plug was a breeze once i downloaded the app for my iPhone. app prompted me to update firmware and within a few minutes the plug was ready for use. will need to dig deeper to setup a schedule so that i can have certain lights turn on at a set time. will definitely be ordering more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. I got this to turn off my 3D ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I got this to turn off my 3D printer from remote locations. Setup was a real PITA, and after I got it to work it would shut off randomly. Even while off I would get notifications via text that the switch has been disconnected. So far dlink has lost me as a customer. I have 6 cameras and this and they all failed after warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Once I got that it worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Initial setup was frustrating and buggy. One call to customer service and discovered that I HAD to use the correct iPhone app (My Dlink Home) to get it setup. Once I got that it worked like a charm. I wish the app had more flexibility, i. e., flexible time setting like random start and stop, dawn or dusk settings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Failed at firmware update
customer_reviews.text: Never worked, bricked itself during a firmware update. Returned to Amazon as a defective unit - I love Amazon's very reasonable return policy for defective items.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: NOT READY FOR USE!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to sync with my router. Worked with it for 3 hours, customer service, etc. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: TxLonghorn

customer_reviews.title: Save your money does not stay connected to the Internet
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This thing could never stay connected to the Internet. had it three months now. And not a day go's by that I have to re-connected to the Internet sometimes more than twice. Wish I had returned it. I just kept having hope for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Him

customer_reviews.title: Defective Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 items of this product, to control my home lights while on vacation. For one item, the Wi-Fi connection kept getting disconnected, so it has been quite useless. It's definitely not a problem with my Wi-Fi router, that works well for all my other devices. Once I came back from vacation, I tried to return the defective unit, but apparently it's not possible any more because more than a month has passed since I bought it, even if I would return it because it doesn't work - pretty lame.
customer_reviews.author: Piero Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Great smart outlet.
customer_reviews.text: This outlet is working great and has all the features i was looking for. You can control it from anywhere, or set schedules for it. It also has a power meter built in and overheat protection to shut down if the appliance has an issue. I will being buying more to setup throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Junkie

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to turn on lights from bed
customer_reviews.text: I don't have outlets that run on my light switch because I live in an older home, so the switch only turns on the overhead light. Well, I don't have to search for the switch in the dark anymore! I love being able to turn on lights from bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly F

customer_reviews.title: Works ok. Not sure if I would purchase again ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Not sure if I would purchase again. It does turn the devices on and off on schedule. Well, it has been a year. I went to access the controls on the app and on the web site tonight and neither works!! Disappointing!! Called customer service and it was terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: Device doesn't work right and the phone app is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Setup wasn't as easy as it says. Phone app is horrible and clears the schedule settings after a couple weeks. Also, at certain times the smart plug would either randomly shut off for a minute then come back on, or would do this clicking thing. I've gotten so fed up with the two that I have that I'm throwing them away and searching for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Plug for remote control lamp
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out how to use it on a lamp ok
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was to be a second plug in my home, but it did not function.
customer_reviews.author: B24ert

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not for too long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the D-Link Smart Plug in June 2014. The setup didn't go so smoothly but, with perserverece, I got it working after about 4hrs. The Android Smart Phone App works well and the product performed well, for the most part (with occasional disconnects / reconnects) for about 1 year and 8 months. Then it just died. The Warranty is only 1yr. So product worked as advertised, but only lasted 1yr and 8 months. (I'm glad my refrigerator isn't made by D-Link.)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Mis-fired & turned off regularly
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality, but this would frequently drop power to the device even though there were no registered faults or confirmations of a water-sensor shutoff sequence being activated. Don't put on anything you're plugging that is critical to remain powered.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Used this badboy in my son's room as a nightlight ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this badboy in my son's room as a nightlight control. Since hes a very light sleeper, i peek into his room (via Dlink IP Camera) and use the app to turn off the light. Its a win-win as I dont have to get up to turn off the light!
customer_reviews.author: ELVIS J.

customer_reviews.title: Problem with set up. GOOD customer service help at D-Link. Working as expected now.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem the with set up of this switch. I was surprised that I got a human in customer service at D-Link as quickly as I did. About a minute. I spoke to a nice man named "Ford", agent # AR004620. He walked me through a quick solution. All seems well now.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS B MARCH

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box had been opened and retaped shut. Should have been at a refurbished price - not new!
customer_reviews.author: Review4U

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for non-critical plugs
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be trusted for outlets that can never turn off. I have had these units switch the power off on their own while hooked to a circuit that powered a computer. Perfect for non-critical plugs, but do not plug your fridge into one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Great device, able to remotely control lamps when away from home. Easy install
customer_reviews.author: HRA

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Don’t buy it. I apparently didn’t read the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. My boyfriend and I are both in the high tech industry and don't struggle with technology but we have both spent hours and cannot get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: D-Link products
customer_reviews.text: The seller was excellent. The product is very difficult to set up. I went through 6 before I could get two to work.
customer_reviews.author: daler8

customer_reviews.title: THIS UNIT STOPPED WORKING AFTER A FEW MONTHS OF OPERATION ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS UNIT STOPPED WORKING AFTER A FEW MONTHS OF OPERATION.. IT WONT SIMPLY CONNECT TO THE INTERNET EVEN THOUGH I HAVE TRIED ALL FIXES
customer_reviews.author: Hector C.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for wasting my time, D-LINK
customer_reviews.text: Absolute JUNK..... I cant get passed the initial setup because the Android app keeps telling me the PIN Code which came with the item is invalid...
customer_reviews.author: Pepper power

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. I purchased several and a few work ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. I purchased several and a few work and other don't. When contacted DLINK support the simply ignored the issue. Search on google for: dsp-w215 "incorrect pin code" and you will find a lot of people having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: AN-KI, S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage. Do not buy. Spend the extra 10$ or whatever for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I can now control my bedroom A/C and have it nice and cool by the time I get home. I tried a different Belkin plug but it had issues for some reason showing up in the app, so I like this a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Robby M

customer_reviews.title: CANT CONNECT
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to connect , don’t waste your money on this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: Probably would look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing. One of two we ordered would not sync properly.
customer_reviews.author: Comaha

customer_reviews.title: This smartplug is really good. It does everything as described by D-Link
customer_reviews.text: This smartplug is really good. It does everything as described by D-Link. I've been using it and I have no worries about it. I didn't give 5 stars due to that sometimes it takes long until it respond properly, but it is only when you open the app to control the device. Therefore, I gave 4 stars. Even though the device takes a little long to respond when you open the app, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: OSEIAS C M SLOMPO

customer_reviews.title: APP is very slow to load the unit turn on or off
customer_reviews.text: It does the job to turn on and off well and it does for routers that don't have WPS buttons on them. I gave it 4 stars instead 5 because the APP is very slow to load the unit into it to turn on or off
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: turns itself off
customer_reviews.text: Great but it will turn it's self off without me which is not good I have it set to my garage door and I was stuck at the apartment until the people came in and pulled the emergency cord
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Flawed in many ways
customer_reviews.text: The activation code that was supplied for the product did not work. And the worst part about it is the code is one of the last steps to set it up. Spent all that time going through the steps to set it up then got to a dead end. Sent product back for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We got this so we could let my daughter fall asleep with the light on and then turn it off remotely. However we could not get it to work on either my android or my hus
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you get it configured. Not the easiest item to setup and I am well adapt at wireless networking. I believe D-Link needs to work on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Mreaves

customer_reviews.title: Belkin weMo is better Its the first dlink product That i dont like ...
customer_reviews.text: The aps is soso Its take near à minute to the dlink to log on into the apps... Belkin weMo is better Its the first dlink product That i dont like a lot...
customer_reviews.author: 77CCM77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent merchant. Items ordered came exactly as listed. ☺ 5 ★ STARS ★ Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John Morton

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, Does control ON/OFF of lamps
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, Does control ON/OFF of lamps. Have not been able to try with motion sensor, because cannot use motion sensor with the App. Go figure!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fgelodia

customer_reviews.title: my only issue is the android/ios app is not as sophisticated as I would have liked, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: just received it, set no problems, my only issue is the android/ios app is not as sophisticated as I would have liked, but gets the job done. would I buy it again, yes, plan on ordering 2 more in the next few days
customer_reviews.author: K. ronald

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as needed, pretty cool - probably wouldnt bother with the power meter version.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrscoobie

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to view realtime watt usage. forget it. slow delayed. updates once every 30 min if lucky. also poor connectivity reliability
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is easy to set up. When I did have a problem D-Link support was excellent. Agent AR004620 solved my problem (user error) quickly and was patient with my ramblings. It was ref. # C6577395. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Their camera is fine. These duds
customer_reviews.text: Work with a computer geek from Yale and he could not get them to work. Duds. Their camera is fine. These duds .
customer_reviews.author: Brett J. Erb

customer_reviews.title: Dlink is a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Dlink is a great idea i have 5 items of this working right now in home and is very good... a little slow with the APP androit but i like it
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Tornillo

customer_reviews.title: but it does work just fine once it is hooked up
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pair with wireless network as simply as it claims, but it does work just fine once it is hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P.

customer_reviews.title: Tech support at D-Link was great. Minimal wait time and wonderful courtesy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The set up wasn't quite 1-2-3. as the little card indicated.Set up required manual input of information. Tech support at D-Link was great. Minimal wait time and wonderful courtesy on the part of tech #A-R004639. He resolved all of my issues.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the worst purchase I made for a very long time
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst purchase I made for a very long time. Why? The app doesn't even work. I can't even say it's buggy because it's not even working at all. It just kept crashing when I try to open it. I have never even once able to get the app open after installing. It just kept "unfortunately, mydlink home had stopped." I am not sure what to do with the plug, probably return it. This is a huge disappointment. I saw a reply from dlink for some customer with the same issue and the link provided just go to support landing page without describing how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Had some minor issues connecting one of the two I bought at first, but with a plug/unplug, it came up. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I expected more from D-Link
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to program. I ordered two. One worked the other did not. The software was not easy to use when I attempted to activate via the iPhone App. Also, I cannot find how to hide this device from automatically broadcasting over the air.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baker

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it to work after several days. Either ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it to work after several days. Either I'm slow on the uptake, or the instructions are a bit convoluted.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Girard Vallerand

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what I had intended it to do. The IFTTT function expands its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Harrison

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cannot connect to it from my phone via wifi and therefore has never been able to configure it. S***!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mydlink account creation completely fails to work
customer_reviews.text: The entire point of this device is the ability to remotely control the plug and creating an account to do so within the app does not work. [...] does not even mention the device and the app either fails to connect or says it "Can not create account." To make things even worse, the app will consistently bug you to create an account EVERY SINGLE TIME you start it, without giving you any way of actually doing so
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 - managed to hook one up and have it work for 5 minutes. Then tried to connect second one and lost first one and second one failed to connect. After trying for an hour giving up and returning.
customer_reviews.author: John F Noss

customer_reviews.title: NOT READY FOR PRIME TIME....
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work from a different WiFi network. OK... I bought this to control a device in my work place. When I use my iPhone app within the same network as the Smart Plug, it works as advertised (but VERY slow to respond). Now, when I go home and try to access the device via my home WiFi network, all I get is "No SmartPlug found, Press + to add a new SmartPlug into your account". I don't get it. Can't I control the device from ANYWHERE? If not, what good is it? There were NO instructions included with the device, and little or no Internet support for the device. NOT READY FOR PRIME TIME.....
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up through app, but I already had a dlink account. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: much appreciated it was annoying to not be able to set up myself but ...

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to connect plug to the Wi-Fi via WPS or manually. The IOS app (on iPad and iPhone) continued to return the error message "PIN Code Incorrect". Contacted customer support, after 20 minutes, they indicated that the product had known issues and was considered defective.

customer_reviews.title: but since the last update it's gotten a lot better. I had some trouble originally when setting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I would have rated it a 3, but since the last update it's gotten a lot better. I had some trouble originally when setting it up (using an iPhone 6), but eventually got it to work after resetting it a couple times. Used these to control Christmas lights, and they worked great once they were finally set up. Takes a little bit of patience to set up, but once it does it works fine.

product_meta.title: D-Link Smart Plug, Energy Monitoring, On/Off, DSP-W215, Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
product_meta.description: The mydlink Wi-Fi Smart Plug (DSP-W215) is a compact, multi-purpose and easy to use device that allows you to monitor and control your home’s electronic devices from anywhere. Use the free mydlink Home app to turn devices on or off, monitor energy use of connected devices, create on/off schedules and set up push alert notifications. The Wi-Fi Smart Plug features a built-in thermal sensor that automatically shuts your connected device off before it overheats to prevent damage to the device or your home. The mydlink Home app will allow you to switch your device on or off remotely and change your energy use schedules on-the-go, so you don’t have to worry about leaving devices on when you’re away.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
Create on/off schedules for your devices
Easy setup Designed to work with existing Wi Fi networks (no additional hub required)
Use with other mydlink Home devices and the free mydlink Home app to create a smarter, more secure and more aware home
Works with any smartphone or tablet running Android 41 or higher or iOS 70 and higher
IFTTT compatible Pair with any IFTTT enabled product or app to connect your Wi Fi Smart Plug to the world in fun and useful ways
Compatible with Amazon Echo (sold separately) for hands free voice control
IFTTT compatible Pair with any IFTTT enabled product or app to connect your Wi Fi Smart Plug to the world in fun and useful ways
